Employee Resource Groups (ERGs) are voluntary groups of employees who have a common interest in helping KLA achieve its 
inclusion and diversity goals. ERGs give colleagues the opportunity to come together to openly share ideas, elevate awareness on 
important issues and help the company gain a better understanding of what it needs to do to be more inclusive and diverse.
